intro: Melandrium lichiangense, commonly known as the Yunnan catchfly, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Caryophyllaceae and is characterized by its erect stems and clusters of small, pinkish-white flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and rocky areas. Its leaves are linear and slightly hairy, and it produces small, capsule-like fruits that contain numerous seeds. Melandrium lichiangense is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and ecological adaptations.
